name: GoGo Monkey
description:
Entry for the 5th annual Valleyfield game jam

Theme: Rebellion

amazing people that made the game possible : 

Guo Rui Huang - environment art and UI

Hugo Lambert - sounds and environment art

Fanny Ngo - animation and character artist

Émile Bouchard - programation and game design

Félix Gagné - tec art, texture and level design
